title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t0.0
text: Most of us have used LinkedIn to search for a job or to make new professional connections.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t7.5600000000000005
text: But how can AI help facilitate all the many ways users engage with LinkedIn?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t14.16
text: Find out today when we talk with Yashu, LinkedIn's Head of Data.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t19.72
text: Welcome to Me, Myself and AI, a podcast on artificial intelligence and business.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t24.900000000000002
text: Each episode, we introduce you to someone innovating with AI.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t28.66
text: I'm Sam Ransbotham, Professor of Information Systems at Boston College.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t33.22
text: I'm also the guest editor for the AI and Business Strategy Big Idea Program at MIT Sloan Management Review.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t40.1
text: And I'm Shervin Khodoband, a senior partner with BCG, and I also co-lead BCG's AI practice in North America.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t46.86
text: Together, MIT SMR and BCG have been researching AI for six years now, interviewing hundreds of practitioners

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t54.22
text: and surveying thousands of companies on what it takes to build and deploy and scale AI capabilities across the organization

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t62.22
text: and really transform the way organizations operate.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t66.62
text: Shervin, I'm excited today to be talking with Yashu, Head of Data at LinkedIn.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t70.78
text: Yaw, thanks for taking the time to join us. Welcome.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t73.74
text: Thank you for having me.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t75.25999999999999
text: Let's start with your current role.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t77.14
text: What do you do for LinkedIn?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t79.02
text: I am part of the engineering organization.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t81.46
text: I lead the team that's called Data.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t84.17999999999999
text: I know it's very confusing to people outside of LinkedIn to realize what data really means.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t88.74
text: But essentially, if you think about all the data science, AI and privacy engineering, it's all happening in my organization.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t97.38
text: So we do all the way from research to production.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t101.94
text: So it's a pretty big organization that is really helping the company realizing our ambition in data in AI.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t109.94
text: And what is that ambition?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t112.02
text: It's really using AI, using data to help create economic opportunity for the global workforce.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t121.05999999999999
text: Comment a little bit more about that.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t123.38
text: I like, by the way, how you said, look, it's all about creating opportunity and economic value.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t129.45999999999998
text: And you didn't say it's about bringing the most advanced technologies and building sophisticated algorithms,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t138.9
text: which is all, I'm sure, part and parcel for what you do.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t142.66
text: But you started with a very higher meta framing and positioning.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t148.26
text: Really encouraging to hear that.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t149.54000000000002
text: But just generally comment on what that is for LinkedIn and what role does AI play in that?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t156.58
text: First of all, I think that creating advanced technology to me, that is how.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t162.02
text: The end goal is not just creating technology, but really like I mentioned, creating opportunities.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t167.62
text: Maybe I would break it down a little bit.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t169.78
text: I don't know how well the audience understand LinkedIn in general.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t174.9
text: We like to think of ourselves as we have three key marketplaces.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t180.57999999999998
text: We have our knowledge marketplace, where if you think about as people creating content on LinkedIn

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t186.1
text: and people consuming content and getting informed so that they can advance in their career and

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t191.85999999999999
text: making the right connections to the right people.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t194.1
text: So that's what we call knowledge marketplace.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t196.58
text: We also have the talent marketplace.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t199.14
text: This is when job seekers come to LinkedIn and also employers and companies posting jobs and recruiters

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t205.54
text: finding the right talent for the companies.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t207.7
text: So that's our talent marketplace, which also include our learning.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t211.94
text: Thinking about individuals or professionals who are rescaling themselves so that they

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t216.82
text: can continue to advance in their career or finding new opportunities.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t221.06
text: The third marketplace is really what the product services marketplace.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t224.82
text: This is where marketers come to LinkedIn platform and then really try to identify the buyers for

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t231.62
text: their product and services, sales individuals coming to LinkedIn and really try to identify

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t236.5
text: the buyers as well for them.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t238.66
text: If we're thinking about the role that AI plays, hopefully with that context, it's very clear that

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t245.94
text: obviously in the knowledge marketplace, we are really trying to match the content creators with

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t251.62
text: the right content consumers.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t253.38
text: In the talent marketplace, we really just try to match the job seekers with the right

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t258.9
text: companies and with the right opportunities.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t261.54
text: Then for the product and services marketplace, we're just trying to match buyers, et cetera.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t267.54
text: When you're putting in that context, I hope it's very straightforward to say that obviously

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t272.74
text: data and AI plays such an essential role because how do you match them?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t279.22
text: It's really through advanced technologies that we have in data and AI.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t309.54
text: So how do you match them then takes us to a variety of use cases and experiences and

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t318.34000000000003
text: just curious, how do you come up with those?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t323.78000000000003
text: What is the process where you've got the business side and you've got the technology and engineering

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t329.38000000000005
text: and data side working together?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t332.18
text: Take us through the recipe.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t333.54
text: Yeah.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t334.68
text: I would actually maybe start getting to the tactical aspects of things.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t340.12
text: I think LinkedIn is a very unique place because the way that I describe

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t344.52000000000004
text: LinkedIn as a three different marketplaces, and then the way that data and AI play a role,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t349.56
text: that's how our CEO describe LinkedIn.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t352.68
text: What I've described is not so much like, oh, this is our data or AI view of LinkedIn.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t359.48
text: This is LinkedIn as a company's overarching view of LinkedIn.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t364.52000000000004
text: Hopefully that set the stage for how integrated data and AI is for the mission and the vision

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t374.92
text: of the company, for how the company operates, for the collaboration that we can talk more about,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t381.08000000000004
text: for how different product development processes work and collaboration happens across different

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t387.24
text: team boundaries.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t388.44
text: That's where I wanted to start with because it's just one word, it's very integrated.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t393.71999999999997
text: Tactically, and maybe just talk about a little bit of how we are organized.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t398.59999999999997
text: LinkedIn is very functionally organized.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t401.4
text: If you're looking at who sits at our CEO's table, you have essentially all the functional heads.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t408.76
text: Head of engineering, head of product, head of sales, head of marketing, head of

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t412.12
text: legal, HR, head of obviously finance.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t416.28
text: We are having a very strong muscle because of that to work cross-functionally.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t422.36
text: So even though that all the data science and AI functions are in my team, we have the muscle

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t429.40000000000003
text: and the structure to enable really strong collaboration between all the other functions

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t436.44
text: that we work with in order to bring the AI solutions to production, to life, and to deliver

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t442.68
text: those values to our members and customers.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t445.24
text: So concretely, my team, I have leaders who are focused on different areas.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t451.72
text: As an example, I have a leader who is focusing on our consumer experience in particular.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t458.28000000000003
text: The way that he would operate is that he would work very closely in a very embedded fashion

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t465.0
text: with other cross-functional leaders who focus on consumer experience.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t470.20000000000005
text: What does that mean?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t470.92
text: Is that they have many, many touch points all the way from quarterly planning, how do

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t479.0
text: you set the OKR, how do you do reviews.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t482.52
text: When it comes to a particular initiative, then you've got functional heads all come

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t487.4
text: together and then strategize what needs to happen, who to work on them, planning our

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t494.12
text: roadmaps.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t494.76
text: All these are happening just very seamlessly as a cross-functional team.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t499.72
text: Like I said, because we as a company have always, ever since the existence of LinkedIn,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t504.84
text: always operated in this way, that everyone has their muscle.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t509.32
text: It's brilliant because Sam and I have done a lot of research here and talked with companies

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t514.68
text: across sectors.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t515.48
text: And it's really interesting.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t517.56
text: You said the three key words, which have been really challenges for most who aren't getting

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t525.08
text: any value from AI, right?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t526.2
text: You said strategy and mission.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t527.64
text: That's where you started with.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t528.84
text: You said integrated cross-functional teams.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t532.04
text: And then you said collaboration.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t534.52
text: And in fact, when you look at the data of 90% of companies who aren't really getting

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t539.96
text: as much value for their investments in AI than those 10% who are getting, it comes down

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t545.16
text: to these very three points.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t546.68
text: And it's interesting that LinkedIn since inception has been that kind of a place where

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t553.88
text: it's been data first and in an integrated way, completely resonates.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t560.0400000000001
text: And also very refreshing that in your role as the head of engineering and data, that

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t566.44
text: that's also where you first go before you go and you talk about everything else, which

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t573.5600000000001
text: is all important, but it's the how, it's not the what.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t576.76
text: Yeah, absolutely.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t578.0400000000001
text: And I always look to the leaders in my team as well.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t581.4000000000001
text: They are not like, I'm just a leader of AI.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t583.8000000000001
text: I'm just a leader of data.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t585.1600000000001
text: Like they really need to understand where the end goal is, right?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t589.08
text: The end goal is never just creating maybe the largest model or the best state of art.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t594.44
text: It's really about delivering the value.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t596.12
text: When you understand that, and then when you got the cross-functional team, all having

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t601.0
text: the same shared goal and purpose, then that also bring that collaboration to life really

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t606.36
text: easily.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t607.8000000000001
text: How hard was that to put that in place and align the incentive and the organization and

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t613.1600000000001
text: keep, you said different muscles, but how hard was that to get to that place?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t618.12
text: Was it always there?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t619.16
text: Were there some very hard decisions that had to be made?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t623.16
text: I have been at LinkedIn for close to nine years now.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t628.04
text: I want to say it's pretty much always there because this is how we've always been organized.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t635.0
text: The culture is so ingrained that I think the new employees will just very quickly assimilated

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t641.4
text: into, and this is sort of how we operate.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t644.2
text: So you mentioned getting better in collaboration, and I'm kind of thinking back on what

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t648.04
text: you were saying about matching.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t649.88
text: You used the word matching in all three of your scenarios.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t654.04
text: What risk is there that you get down this path of a bunch of engineers ever improving

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t659.3199999999999
text: the existing matching algorithms and perhaps missing out on a fourth area that you need

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t665.64
text: to be focusing on?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t667.0
text: Is there a tension that you're feeling between ever improving that matching process through

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t672.68
text: better and better algorithms and data and figuring out where to apply it in some of

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t677.56
text: your newer products like your newsletter or LinkedIn lives or some of those kinds of new

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t683.4
text: things?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t683.8
text: Where's that tension?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t685.56
text: There are nonstop new areas that pops up with regarding how we can innovate and should be

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t691.9599999999999
text: innovating.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t693.0799999999999
text: And even, I mean, just starting with even matching, it's very simplistic to say, hey,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t699.56
text: we just can try to do better matching.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t701.24
text: But what does better matching even mean?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t704.52
text: Let's take our Tana marketplace as example.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t707.08
text: Obviously, we wanted to match the best qualified candidate with the best company.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t713.8
text: But how do you even define that?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t716.36
text: What is best?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t717.16
text: What is best?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t717.8
text: What is the best not only for the job seeker, but also what's the best for the other side

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t723.08
text: of the marketplace, which is the companies?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t725.24
text: If I were to try to hire somebody, my ultimate ideal state is I really only talk to one candidate

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t731.88
text: and that is a dream candidate I wanted to hire.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t733.96
text: And then same thing, let's say in the knowledge marketplace, as we try to connect the content

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t739.8
text: creators to people who are interested in reading their articles, what does that even mean by

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t745.4
text: the right matching as well?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t746.4399999999999
text: Is it that we wanted to maximize the engagement that people have on a particular post?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t753.08
text: How do we think about distribution of those engagements across?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t756.6
text: How do we think about, maybe I'm a new creator, first time writing a post on LinkedIn and

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t762.2800000000001
text: I didn't get any response.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t763.88
text: I will be so discouraged and never post again.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t766.2
text: Like, how do we think about that?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t768.0400000000001
text: The shorter term trade-off and the long term trade-off.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t770.5200000000001
text: There's so much more, even just in this very simplistic framework of we're just doing

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t776.9200000000001
text: matching.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t778.0400000000001
text: So now coming out of the matching aspect of it, there's again, way more.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t783.32
text: Thinking about how do we help people do content discovery and how do we think about when advertisers

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t789.5600000000001
text: come to us, how do we actually help them pace their budget?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t792.6800000000001
text: How do we help them utilize the budget better?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t796.5200000000001
text: Given the progressive culture and the highly collaborative, integrated, functional culture

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t804.44
text: of LinkedIn, what makes a good candidate for your team?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t807.96
text: What are you looking for in addition to the hard skills of technology and data and AI

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t814.0400000000001
text: and data science?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t814.9200000000001
text: What do you think is the secret sauce there?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t818.6800000000001
text: I would say number one, someone who I think Satya was the one who said that, would you

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t825.64
text: want to hire a learning adult or a know-it-all?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t830.6
text: I am a strong believer of a learning adult.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t836.92
text: What makes a candidate successful in the past doesn't necessarily mean that they will be

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t840.68
text: successful in the future.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t842.28
text: That attitude of I'm going to learn, I'm going to adapt, I think that's so important.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t848.36
text: I would say learning somebody who is really a big learner.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t853.5600000000001
text: The second one is someone who is just curious.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t859.8
text: Because when you are curious, you have that drive, you have that, I'm going to get to

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t863.64
text: the bottom of it.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t865.16
text: So much of the amazing progress we've made is because someone is like, you know what,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t872.36
text: I'm not here for all the fluffy things.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t875.56
text: I'm just going to be here to really focus on this problem that I saw that I'm just trying

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t880.28
text: to figure out how to solve it.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t882.68
text: It reminds me, I had a mentor that used to tell me there is no boring projects, only

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t889.24
text: boring people.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t890.8399999999999
text: And so every time I was like, I'm not sure I'm crazy about this project.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t894.76
text: He says, you could make it interesting.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t896.76
text: You have ability to learn, you have the ability to complain constructively.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t900.8399999999999
text: So now you're saying that it brought back to my memory, there's only boring people,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t905.8
text: no boring project.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t907.0799999999999
text: Absolutely.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t907.64
text: I love that.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t908.1999999999999
text: I may start quoting that as well.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t911.0
text: What's interesting, and I think that ties into you're a bit of a hero in the academic

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t915.24
text: community.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t916.1999999999999
text: I think maybe you're attracted to those people.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t918.04
text: Academics complain a lot.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t919.24
text: Maybe you're attracted to those academics that complain a lot, but I wanted to tie that

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t923.16
text: to another way that you're creating economic value through LinkedIn.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t928.28
text: And I think one thing that's really fascinating here is that you've got a platform that has

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t932.92
text: insight into what's going on into the economics of the invisible hand, making the invisible

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t939.5600000000001
text: hand visible.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t940.6
text: You've got unparalleled insight.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t942.52
text: I was hoping you could talk a little bit about the things that you, I mean, I'm aware of

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t946.28
text: some of the things you've done with code and with your LinkedIn graph projects with

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t949.56
text: the academic world.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t951.0799999999999
text: What are you doing in that aspect to get the insights into those things that we've just

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t955.48
text: never had insight into before?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t958.4399999999999
text: Really, really good point.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t960.92
text: Because of the volume that we have on the platform and how much economic opportunity

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t966.92
text: activity that happens on the platform, that we particularly have that insights into like

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t973.16
text: future work, what skills are in demand, like how different companies are hiring, which

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t978.8399999999999
text: industry is hiring more and hiring less.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t981.8
text: And even just thinking about the equity aspects of it as well, like do women, men, having

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t989.4
text: different rate of job changing, et cetera, and advancements in their careers, all that.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t994.28
text: So tons of insights that we have on our platform.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t997.48
text: So what we have done, and Sam, you alluded into is, by the way, we call all these activities,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1003.72
text: this vibrant activity on our graph, what we call economic graph.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1008.04
text: And we have started a particular effort on economic graph probably like seven, at least

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1016.6
text: six years ago, where we essentially stand up a team that includes a bunch of folks on

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1021.32
text: my team, with our policy teams, with our comms teams, with our editorial teams, that

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1027.8
text: really try to share and bring some of those data and insights to the external communities.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1033.56
text: And we have been very successful.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1035.72
text: As a matter of fact, for example, last year, we have sent a report to most of the congressmen

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1046.28
text: women on what is the labor marketplace look like for their region.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1052.76
text: We have collaboration partnership, for example, with Singapore Education Department to help

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1058.92
text: them figure out what are the skills that are in demand and it's lacking so that they can

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1065.32
text: change their educational curriculum to help.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1068.6
text: That's just huge.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1070.12
text: And then we have worked with obviously like a lot of other institutions, either much more

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1075.8
text: directly with a particular local government or with some like World Economic Forum, G20.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1082.68
text: We share a lot of our reports with them to help influence some of the policies they have.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1088.12
text: Another simple example is we are really helping the border community know what the green skills

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1096.6
text: people who are either hiring for green skills, people who are like, where is that talent

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1102.84
text: going so that as we invest more in green energy that both the governments and those

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1110.12
text: industries can be more guided in that from talent perspective.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1113.72
text: That's huge.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1115.1599999999999
text: You've been featured in Fortune's 40 Under 40.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1118.4399999999998
text: You've written a book, you've given numerous speeches.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1122.28
text: You're a very successful practitioner in a very successful company.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1126.36
text: I'm curious, what would your advice be to your peers in other organizations that are

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1135.8799999999999
text: leveraging AI as the how to achieve whatever the what of their company is?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1142.36
text: What would be like the two things that you think might not be obvious to others?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1147.56
text: Maybe my first thing that came to my mind is maybe not so provocative.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1152.6
text: It's really just have the best talent.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1155.0800000000002
text: And it's so important.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1157.88
text: I am such a strong believer that when you bring the best people, all you need to do

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1165.48
text: is to get out of the way and then helping them to be successful and then wonder just happens.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1170.92
text: Many of folks on my team can do their job way better than I can do their job,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1175.24
text: especially in a field that is constantly innovating.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1181.16
text: I always joke about how the pace that this field, this domain is changing is just like 300,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1191.24
text: 500 miles per hour.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1192.68
text: It's crazy.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1193.96
text: I got my PhD in this domain and I was in this workshop that was talking about graph

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1200.3600000000001
text: and neural network and just graph learning in general.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1203.4
text: And what the practitioners are doing today versus when I was doing my thesis 10 years ago,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1211.16
text: it's entirely different.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1213.16
text: And what was state of art 10 years ago is nowhere to be found in today's practice.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1219.48
text: So I think that's, again, just re-emphasize on how important it is to bring the best people

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1224.8400000000001
text: and the talent, especially in a very innovative space.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1228.0400000000002
text: And the second thing I want to say is maybe this is a little less obvious,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1233.24
text: is to make data and AI work in a company, the way to do it is not to build a wall.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1242.44
text: Not to build a wall between folks who know data and AI and people who don't know data and AI.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1249.08
text: And by the way, this is a general pitfall either in the mindset of people or how companies are

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1256.68
text: organized.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1258.0400000000002
text: If you have this, let's say you got an expert team who is like the world class in data and AI,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1265.5600000000002
text: and then you just expect, hey, you know what?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1268.0400000000002
text: The rest of the company knows nothing about data and AI.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1271.96
text: I think what you said about talent is probably not obvious to many.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1275.3200000000002
text: And I also think it really corroborates your earlier point about curiosity and learning.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1281.0800000000002
text: If those are the ingredients, then of course talent matters a lot.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1285.5600000000002
text: So thank you for that.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1287.3200000000002
text: We're just seeing that over and over again.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1289.4
text: Maybe it's just the kinds of people that we're perhaps attracted to on the show,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1293.16
text: but it does seem to be showing up a lot.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1296.1200000000001
text: Absolutely.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1297.48
text: Okay.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1297.88
text: So is this time for the five questions?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1300.3600000000001
text: Should we do that or do that?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1302.1200000000001
text: Do you know about this?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1303.3200000000002
text: I don't know about this, but fire away.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1305.3200000000002
text: Oh, we didn't tell you.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1306.52
text: All right.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1307.0
text: So we have this.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1308.8400000000001
text: I like surprises.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1310.0400000000002
text: We have this thing where we have like five questions.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1312.52
text: You could just riff, give an answer.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1314.6
text: So what's your proudest AI moment?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1318.76
text: I would probably go back all the way to when I was in grad school and I was taking this class.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1327.6399999999999
text: It was probably the very first time I really saw AI in application in the way that you can feel,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1334.76
text: you can touch.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1335.6399999999999
text: I was taking this class with Andrew Ng, where we are just supposedly building an algorithm

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1341.48
text: that is able to give in a stream of video, identify objects in the video.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1347.56
text: And I worked really hard with a classmate of mine and a close friend of mine.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1352.52
text: And then at the end of the day, they had this competition of the accuracy and precision recall,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1358.04
text: et cetera, et cetera.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1359.16
text: In a pretty large class, we won our second place.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1362.52
text: So not the first place, still room for improvement, but very proud that especially like I was,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1368.68
text: second year in my PhD.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1369.72
text: And before that, a lot of my experience was a little more contrived examples.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1375.56
text: Very good.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1376.68
text: What worries you about AI?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1379.88
text: On one hand, obviously I'm super excited for the potential,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1383.0800000000002
text: but what worries me about AI would be in the responsible AI space.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1387.88
text: In particular, obviously I'm really glad the attention that responsible AI is able to get

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1393.64
text: in the public and in the research community, in industry as well.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1397.8
text: But at the same time, it's not just the buzzword.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1400.68
text: We got to really put it in practice and making sure that we are continuing to research on how

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1405.96
text: we are able to identify biases that AI system can bring.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1410.28
text: And it's a super challenging space.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1413.08
text: I've been working in this space for, I want to say like extensively a couple of years now,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1418.9199999999998
text: and just knowing how challenging this is.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1421.32
text: So my call to action to your audience is definitely the need in the space and the

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1426.84
text: research continue to push the boundaries on what's possible.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1430.9199999999998
text: Very well said.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1432.12
text: What is your favorite activity that does not require technology?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1436.6799999999998
text: That's easy.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1437.48
text: It's skiing.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1438.9199999999998
text: That requires technology.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1441.32
text: It does not require technology.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1443.48
text: The ski.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1445.6399999999999
text: Oh, come on.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1447.9599999999998
text: Bite the head argument.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1449.8
text: Yeah, you could explain that to anything.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1451.72
text: Come on.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1453.08
text: About four years ago, I really got into skiing.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1456.12
text: And the reason I love about skiing, it's a forced meditation.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1461.6399999999999
text: It's like you go down the hill and I'm not nearly a good skier, but like all I think

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1467.2399999999998
text: about is how can I get down safely?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1469.0
text: Yes.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1469.6399999999999
text: Nothing else came to mind.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1471.0
text: So that...

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1472.1999999999998
text: I was sure you were going to say gradient descent.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1478.04
text: That's funny.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1478.9199999999998
text: But I also like the every time when you go out, it's different because the snow condition,

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1485.48
text: the weather, the slope all adds variability to how you actually do when you ski in that

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1492.1200000000001
text: day.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1492.44
text: So I love that just because it's never status quo.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1496.1200000000001
text: What was the first career you wanted like in your childhood?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1500.1200000000001
text: Where did you want to be when you grew up?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1503.24
text: Well, if you say way back, I joke about it still today.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1507.48
text: Like I told my mom I wanted to be president.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1509.96
text: I'll vote for you.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1511.24
text: What's your greatest wish for AI in the future?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1516.28
text: It just really helps.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1518.2
text: AI should serve the people and help everything that we're doing to be more efficient and

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1523.88
text: better.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1524.52
text: And I mean, I would say that in general about technology, right?

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1527.3200000000002
text: Like so many things that we were not able to do, now we can do because of AI and technology.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1533.64
text: So I'm continuing to be very bullish about that.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1537.96
text: And I'm very excited that I can be part of it.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1540.84
text: Thank you.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1541.72
text: Yeah, it is absolutely wonderful talking to you.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1543.96
text: You know, I was thinking back at what you were talking about muscles.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1546.44
text: And when you first said muscles, I have to say I was thinking biceps.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1549.56
text: You know, I'm thinking about big muscles.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1551.48
text: But you know, as we've talked, I'm now thinking more like eye muscles.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1555.32
text: You know, like focus, like getting the granularity.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1558.2
text: Because what you're talking about is the data that's going to let us see things that are

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1562.04
text: happening in the world that we just have not been able to see before.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1566.52
text: And I just think that's fascinating.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1568.2
text: And we really enjoyed talking to you today.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1570.12
text: Thank you so much.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1571.3999999999999
text: Thank you.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1571.96
text: Thank you for having me.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1573.32
text: Yeah, it's been truly, truly insightful.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1575.3999999999999
text: And thank you for making time.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1577.6399999999999
text: Of course.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1579.8799999999999
text: Thanks for joining us today.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1581.3999999999999
text: On our next episode, Shervin and I talk with Nitsan Mekelbrobom, eBay's chief AI officer.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1587.3999999999999
text: Hope you can join us then.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1589.8799999999999
text: Thanks for listening to Me, Myself and AI.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1592.36
text: We believe, like you, that the conversation about AI implementation doesn't start and

text: stop with this podcast.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1598.04
text: That's why we've created a group on LinkedIn specifically for listeners like you.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1601.6399999999999
text: It's called AI for Leaders.

title: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu
id: The Collaboration Muscle - LinkedIn's Ya Xu-t1603.3999999999999
